name: places/ChIJuSzNU7pYwokRxzakTTMLlgQ
formattedAddress: 324 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 324 East 86th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain retailer selling a wide array of branded spring, memory foam & adjustable mattresses.

originalText.text: The in-store personnel were very kind and helpful but the end result was as disappointing as it gets. Ordered a couple pillows that were supposed to get delivered within a week or two. Following its failure to be delivered, every week for an additional 3 weeks I was promised “its at the warehouse, next week for sure it will be here” and it never arrived. After more than a month I had to cancel the order because it was clear that it was never going to be delivered.

originalText.text: my mattress was delivered this morning with no hiccups. the 2 delivery men were very polite and professional and set up very quickly. kudos to Salome and his helper!

text.text: my mattress was delivered this morning with no hiccups. the 2 delivery men were very polite and professional and set up very quickly. kudos to Salome and his helper!

originalText.text: We were immediately greeted by David Schwartz upon entering the store. David was most welcoming and helpful. He carefully listened to what we desired in a new mattress and then proceeded to show us several options in the Beautyrest Legend line. We were most thankful for his expert and detailed guidance and we decided upon a McFarland Legend Firm mattress that will suit our needs exceptionally well. Thank you, David, for your kind and expert help! This was a truly wonderful shopping experience!

originalText.text: I had such a positive experience at this location. David S. was incredibly helpful in my search and worked with me to find the ideal mattress.  I was really able to take my time at the store to test the mattresses and ask the necessary questions.    Additionally, the delivery service was reliable and very efficient.  I am quite pleased with my experience and my new mattress!

I was really able to take my time at the store to test the mattresses and ask the necessary questions.    Additionally, the delivery service was reliable and very efficient. originalText.text: While the shopping experience is lovely, the delivery has been a disaster. I was given a window of 5-10pm and it is now 11pm with no phone calls or means to track this. I was told that I would be able to track my delivery through the website with my order number but that wasn't even working. I am livid. I don't know where the mattress is or if it will even get delivered as there is zero communication right now. For how expensive these mattresses are, one should be provided with top notch delivery.
